A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was great. Was there a dumb scene with Leia? Yes. It doesn't ruin the movie or the franchise\, though. All you haters come off like a pack of mouth-breathers with no interest in actual\, good storytelling or cinema. Walking out of the theater\, I overheard two fanboys complaining that all they wanted from the movie was \"no space battles\, and a badass lightsaber fight\, and it failed on both.\" And I'm shaking my damn head.
